title: Who Truly Owns Everything? | Sri Chanchalapathi Dasa @ChanchalapathiDas
speaker: HG Madhu Pandit Dasa

segments.text: I have come into this world, I have this Panchabhuta Sharira, Antribhuta Sharira, Sukshma Sharira
Am I the owner of all this?
Am I the owner of this body and the owner of the senses?
Am I the owner of myself?
Oh we have this body, whatever strength we have, may not be much
But all of this belongs to Sri Rama
And we all belong to Sri Rama
We must use all of this to serve Rama
This is the thinking of a Bhatta
This world belongs to the Lord
